Text:
Graniten84 at 2012-12-20 16:44




wtf?
why you lie about the release date? the movie is great, but you do not have to lie about the specifics



the correct info should be: the opening weekend of 22nd April, 2007
because that's the actual official release date, but I saw it back in 2006 allready, so you comment about the release date being this year and this day just makes me wonder

maybe you need some help with your mental wellness, or maybe you just did it to piss some people off

anyways

plz keep the info correct or don't give any info at all
ty
Infon är korrekt Graniten. Skit i vad vissa skriver, då gnällkärringar finns överallt! :)
